Kevin Durant was nominated for the season-long NBA Cares Community Assist Award...
...presented by Kaiser Permanente for his impact on the lives of homeless youth...
...and his generosity with local families in Oklahoma City.
The organization does such a great job...
...of making sure we're so tied in with the community...
...and it's on us to be the players and the people that we are...
It's amazing how we do things like this.
It impacts so many kids' lives.
I hope they remember it for a long time.
